=CSS=

=Javascript=
==Content Toggle Rule==
If you want to toggling display of content box, follow the example.

{{{
<a href="#CONTENT" data-toggle="#CONTENT">...</a>
<div id="CONTENT">...</div>
}}}

or you can

{{{
<button type="button" data-toggle="#CONTENT">...</button>
<div id="CONTENT">...</div>
}}}

JS CODE - /modules/admin/tpl/js/admin.js

{{{
// Content Toggle
	$('.x [data-toggle^="#"]').click(function(){
		$($(this).attr('data-toggle')).toggle();
		return false;
	});

}}}

==Layer close==
If you want to close layer(parent element), follow the example.

{{{
<div id="CONTENT">
	This layer will be closed.
	<button type="button" class="x_close" data-close="#CONTENT">&times;</button>
</div>
}}}

JS CODE
{{{
// Close Layer
	$('.x [data-close^="#"]').click(function(){
		$($(this).attr('data-close')).hide();
		return false;
	});


}}}
